name: Color Solitaire 3D
description:
Solitaire is the perfect game for anyone looking for a classic and timeless way to pass the time. Whether you're a seasoned solitaire player or new to the game, you'll find hours of entertainment with color solitaire. Easy to control, simply tap on the cards and sort each colors.

Featuring:
◉ Original concept and gameplay
◉ Colored cards
◉ Daily Challenges
◉ Leaderboards
◉ Saga map with hundreds of levels
◉ Loads of fun!
◉ And much more!
